name: Super Smash Market
description:
A huge supermarket will come to town, and totally make you loose your job, man. Totally ungroovy. Let´s try to smash it as much as possible before it opens. 

Credits

A game by Daniel Røskaft, Tobias Heukäufer (https://iche20.itch.io/) and Luisa Enciso (https://luisaenciso.itch.io/) 

This game was created for the Game Design // UE course at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. 

 Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai 

"Game a Week"  (Winter Semester 2020/2021)
